alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; Claiborne; De Soto; Red River; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 16 at 1:58AM CDT until June 16 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 313 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 4 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST ARKANSAS COLUMBIA HEMPSTEAD HOWARD LAFAYETTE LITTLE RIVER MILLER NEVADA SEVIER IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 PARISHES IN NORTHWEST LOUISIANA BIENVILLE BOSSIER CADDO CLAIBORNE DE SOTO RED RIVER WEBSTER IN OKLAHOMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST OKLAHOMA MCCURTAIN IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 15 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST TEXAS BOWIE CAMP CASS FRANKLIN GREGG HARRISON MARION MORRIS PANOLA RED RIVER RUSK SMITH TITUS UPSHUR WOOD THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ARCADIA, ASHDOWN, ATLANTA, BIG SANDY, BOGATA, BOSSIER CITY, BRADLEY, BROKEN BOW, CARTHAGE, CLARKSVILLE, COUSHATTA, DAINGERFIELD, DE QUEEN, DIERKS, GIBSLAND, GILMER, HAWKINS, HAYNESVILLE, HENDERSON, HOMER, HOPE, HUGHES SPRINGS, IDABEL, JEFFERSON, LEWISVILLE, LINDEN, LOGANSPORT, LONE STAR, LONGVIEW, MAGNOLIA, MANSFIELD, MARSHALL, MARTIN, MINDEN, MINEOLA, MINERAL SPRINGS, MOUNT PLEASANT, MOUNT VERNON, NAPLES, NASHVILLE, OMAHA, PITTSBURG, PRESCOTT, QUEEN CITY, QUITMAN, RINGGOLD, SHREVEPORT, SPRINGHILL, STAMPS, STONEWALL, TEXARKANA, TEXARKANA, TYLER, AND WINNSBORO.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; Claiborne; De Soto; Red River; Webster
